mapper.select: SELECT id, address, tag_info tagInfo, note, create_time timeString FROM link_info ORDER BY create_time desc

SELECT ii.issue_id, ii.type, ii.content, oi.option_id, oi.content AS optionContent FROM questionnaire_info AS qi LEFT JOIN questionnaire_issue AS qis ON qi.questionnaire_id = qis.questionnaire_id LEFT JOIN issue_info AS ii ON qis.issue_id = ii.issue_id LEFT JOIN issue_option AS io ON ii.issue_id = io.issue_id LEFT JOIN option_info AS oi ON io.option_id = oi.option_id WHERE qi.questionnaire_id = 1 ORDER BY qis.sort, io.sort
SELECT user_name userName, pass_word passWord FROM user_info WHERE user_name = #{string}
